column4: guys i'm trying to unzip files into var/www... but i don't have permission. how can i get permission?
so i log in as root?
ok... so how do i set permissions to the folder?
so i cd to the file, then i type chmod 777?
its more secure to extract the files to home, you can then run: gksudo nautilus, copy the data over, then close nautilus
dont use 777 on anything, its the worst thing to do to any file or folder on a system
look into what it actually does and to whom it allows access
like i said, run: gksudo nautilus and put the files where they need to go, if you need to only edit them you can run: gksudo gedit
if you dont have X then you will need sudo cp at command line
press alt+f2 and type the command
step very carefully with taht, its very powerful so watch what you do
keep its use to a minimum
i know u r busy, but can u pleez help me?
